channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Blog

item.title: Hello Hugo and Github Pages
item.description: My site - http://www.zhouhaibing.com has many issues: It is hosted on a place which I can not fully trust. It is running on PHP which I am no longer interested at. The way to publish content is pretty inconvenient. With the move into Github Pages, I now feel more confortable to write since: Hugo is written in Go, and I’m primarily working in Go. This is now https enabled.
